entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make senders be the same for different gesture EventArgs #17531
    Backlog
  • Polygon Borders do not properly calculate their inner path #17525
  • Image Border clipping incorrect on Windows #17523
  • Shell.SearchHandler visible in details page on Windows 11 #17521
  • Resolve performance issues introduced by Setter Specificity PR #17520
    .NET 8 GA
  • [BUG] Route parameter behavior is not consistent #17517
  • Abysmal performance in Interop on iOS #17516
  • [iOS] Fontawesome icon binding breaks flyout menu #17512
  • Disapearing controls in CollectionView on scrolling (on Android) #17508
  • Border bugs entries #17506
    .NET 8 GA
  • MAUI Error APT2096 failed to open APK:Invalid file #17503
  • [WinUI] Border inside ScrollView not expanding during resize #17502
    .NET 8 GA
  • all maui app crash on a multi-user android system #17501
  • [Windows] Border with rounded corners does not work well #17500
  • AndroidNativeLibrary not getting picked in `Release` mode. #17497

Closed

  • Obsolete AutomationProperties properties cause XamlC exception on NET 8 #17484
    .NET 8 GA
  • Cannot access a disposed object #17504
  • [NET 8, RC1, Windows] wrong initial BindingConext in CollectionView DataTemplate #17515
  • Shell.NavBarIsVisible does not update on hot reload on Android 8 #7459
    Under Consideration
  • [Bug] Recipes Search Results currently can't be opened via keyboard #3145
    Backlog
  • DevTools not working #17476
  • SkiaSharp based component renders using Shell, does not render using normal navigation #7350
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.4.8333] Full-screening a window no longer removes its title-bar #15676
    .NET 8 GA
  • Developing a Maui Blazor MacCatalyst app for Apple macOS store is a terrible experience #12293
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Maui Blazor template lacks entitlements necessary to submit to Apple macOS store #13094
    Backlog
  • [Windows]CollectionView not show Header and Footer #17499

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0.3xx-sr8] [net7.0] Backport UI Test fixes from main #17535
  • [release/7.0.3xx-sr8] [net7.0] Remove ScrollView Leak Test #17534
  • [release/7.0.3xx-sr8] Update Version #17532
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Rollback xharness bump to 8.0.0-prerelease.23407.2 #17529
  • Fix accent color missing in title bar #17528
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-window, .NET 8 GA
  • [controls] improve "setter specificity" performance #17527
    .NET 8 GA
  • Enable performance CAs for more Core classes #17524
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Improve comments in customer facing project templates #17518
    area/templates 📄
  • Bump powershell from 7.3.6 to 7.3.7 #17511
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the xunit group with 2 updates #17510
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 1 update #17509
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • try fix #17396 #17505

Merged

  • [net7.0] Backport UI Test fixes from main #17496
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [net7.0] Remove ScrollView Leak Test #17522
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [X] pass the logging helper to Template context #17507
  • [net7.0] [iOS/Catalyst] Fix issue loading images from Stream (#16162) #17519
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • [net7.0] Null check everything in InvalidateMeasureIfContentSizeChanged #17493
  • Split out sharable testing for non-element thing #17387
  • Changing value of Shell.NavBarIsVisible should change visibility of toolbar (ShellToolbar) #17358
    area/shell 🐢, partner/hot-reload-xaml, Under Consideration
  • [net7.0] Update all ASP.NET and MS.Extensions packages to latest stable #17487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [net7.0] Update cake files and XCode #17498
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [net7.0] Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #16640
    area/image :framed_picture:, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [net7.0] [iOS] Fix ScrollTo method issues #17093
    area/layout 🔲, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Fixed window not reacting to TitleBar wnd message #17041
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, i/regression, stale, .NET 8 GA
  • Clean up iOS DragAndDropDelegate #17495
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/gestures

Updated

  • [Android] Fix ScrollView filling layouts #17243
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, Under Consideration
  • Enable WinUI Controls Test Pipeline #17221
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, Under Consideration
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Update Flyout when Shell.FlyoutContent changes #17359
    area/shell 🐢, partner/hot-reload-xaml, Under Consideration
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area/layout 🔲, s/pr-needs-author-input, Under Consideration
  • Use Frame command to recalc span bounds #15168
    area/controls 🎮, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    area/controls 🎮, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Fixes border content clipping #17310
    s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] 20230912 Android Ecosystem updates AndroidX #17318
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • Make Android respect power saving/disabled animations #17287
    Under Consideration
  • [XamlC] fix generic array #17301
    area/Xaml </>, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • [X] don't expant types to Extension for x:Static #17276
    area/Xaml </>, stale, Under Consideration
  • Cleanup SwipeView and Propagate BC until we can fix compat layout #17418
    area/Xaml </>, control-swipeview, .NET 8 GA
  • [net8.0] Build the previous TFM for Essentials & Graphics #17042
    .NET 8 GA
  • Remove code from swipe view that kept recreating and re-assigning SwipeItems #17410
    t/bug, control-swipeview, .NET 9 Planning
  • Bump the androidx group with 14 updates #17401
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Remove Debug and Release Entitlements plists and Replace with Custom Entitlements #16355
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, Under Consideration
